ygData.subject: RE: Letter to GZ - Draft 3
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, been a while since I read this, and I had forgotten exactly what I had said.  I was thinking that the comlaint was only about SoW cancelling Selos.
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, been a while since I read this, and I had forgotten exactly what I
had said. I was thinking that the comlaint was only about SoW cancelling
Selos. I'll put the root thing back in.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 4:45 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Letter to GZ - Draft 3


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 29 Sep 1999, Jason Osborne wrote:

> Are we then assuming that Selo's was never supposed to break root, and
that
> that "feature" was in fact a bug?

I agree. Leave that point in there, but change it to ask if
the old state of Accelerando breaking root was a bug, or if
the current state of Accelerando not breaking root is a bug.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
